Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main class of the "Chunter Pac" application. "Chunter Pac" is a very simple, text based adventure game. Users can walk around to collect pieces of cheese. That's all. It should really be extended to make it more interesting! To play this game, create an instance of this class and call the "play" method. This main class creates and initialises all the others: it creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts the game. It also evaluates and executes the commands that the parser returns.
